title: Bug 6656 - Close button moves down when view resized smaller
OB: When the view is resized smaller, the close button moves down to a new line instead of staying on the same line as the label.
EB: The close button should stay on the same line as the label nomatter how small the view gets to ensure usability. Users are accustomed to the close button being on the same line as the label and located to the far right corner.
SR:
1. Open the application
2. Resize the view to make it smaller
3. Check the position of the close button in relation to the label
